name: PaCE
mission: To equip global decision-makers with clear intelligence on political instability and conflict—transforming uncertainty into strategic foresight.
description: PaCE is an intelligence technology company focused on forecasting geopolitical conflict, civil unrest, and political instability using machine learning and dynamic exposure modeling. Purpose-built for decision-makers in finance, insurance, defense, and global enterprise, PaCE delivers interpretable, forward-looking forecasts that translate real-world risk into actionable insight.

valueProposition.title: Forecasts, not just alerts
valueProposition.description: We deliver predictive, time-stamped risk estimates—not just real-time feeds or backward-looking risk ratings.

valueProposition.title: Scientific transparency
valueProposition.description: Every model includes performance metrics, confidence scores, and interpretability mechanisms.

valueProposition.title: Enterprise-ready flexibility
valueProposition.description: Modular SaaS delivery via API, dashboard, and data layers—suitable for integration across private and public sector workflows.

valueProposition.title: Exposure-based insights
valueProposition.description: Clients can map forecasts to specific firm, sector, or regional exposure, enabling firm-level geopolitical risk analysis.

valueProposition.title: Geopolitical ESG intelligence
valueProposition.description: PaCE supports ESG-aligned capital deployment via conflict-sensitive screening and geopolitical sustainability metrics.
